title: 104_hr2028
content: Federal Land Management Agency Concession Reform Act of 1995 - Provides for a uniform concessions management policy for Federal land management agencies, including provisions regarding: (1) concession types, (2) public rates and charges, (3) concession transfers, (4) competitive selection, (5) concession fees, (6) private sector capital improvements, (7) creation of a Board of Concession Appeals. And (8) privatization of Forest Service and Bureau of Land Management lands subject to concession leases.
